title: Can we just congratulate whoever thought of Ornns voice lines?

embed.description: Learn More about Ornn: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/us/featured/champion-reveal-ornn More than most demi-gods, Ornn values his privacy. Dwelling in solitude beneath an ancient volcano, he stokes bubbling cauldrons of molten stone to forge items of unsurpassed quality. Yet from these depths, Ornn senses trouble; divine beings are once again meddling in mortal affairs.

replies.body: May the name FauxShizzle forever echo through the Freljord!
That comes down to FauxShizzle; Ornn's primary writer! You can thank him for the VO and lore to come!
He did the VO too? 10/10 the gruff voice and the lines really suit each other. Can't wait for more on Ornn!
To be clear he wrote the lines, but he wasn't the VO. They hire actors for that.
How do you know all this stuff? Are you an insider?
He is god among men when we read the lore. He is Sharjo, mighty curator of the lore, chosen by Riot to work with them on said stories.

Ornn is me when annoyed. 

I'm going to play him a lot.
From these lines Ornn is currently my spirit animal. I can relate.
I like how Ornn sounds like that gold player mumbling under his breath cause all of his friends are bronze, and he's trying not to flame.
Talks like a support player. XD
i havent had the chance to listen to it yet , does he have any special interactions with other freljordians? sej? ashe? braum?
We won't know till tomorrow when he hits the PBE.

i think its highly likely that he does. im so eager to learn his role in the current story of freljord. will he support ashe and anivia? will he support sejuani? or he gonna bash them both down? maybe he is not part of this freljordian civil war and has his own separate story with other big players of freljord?

so exciting to think about the possibilities!
Yeah, there's a lot he could do :D can't wait.
My bet is that he made the original true ice weapons
He sounds like Idris Elba. Same accent and everything
